channel.title: Geospatial on HealthHeroes
channel.description: Recent content in Geospatial on HealthHeroes

item.title: About
item.description: Description Our project aims to make use of geospatial intelligence to explore the accessibility of residents to amenities that advocate a healthier lifestyle, and also the spatial patterns involved. The scope of our analysis will involve two main facets of a healthier lifestyle, namely food and exercise.
